description.html:
Raw magic resonates within natural crystals and grows powerful, enlarging and becoming mobile into a living mass of crystalline rock.

Their growth from a natural crystal generally causes crystalborn to choose the name that matches that seed stone.
Names: Ruby, Emerald, Mica, Amethyst, Apatite, Millerite, Caclite, Chalcopyrite

CRYSTALBORN TRAITS

Ability Score Increase.Your Strength score increases by 1.
Age. Crystalborn do not age, but instead fade as the magic within them peters out. Some find ways to replenish their reserves to live longer.
Alignment. Dependant on the magic that first infused them, most crystalborn are neutral but can be all alignments.
Size. Tending between 5 and 7 feet and around 200 pounds. Your size is medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 25 feet.
Living Rock. You are immune to disease. You do not need to eat or breathe. Instead of sleeping, you enter an inactive state for 4 hours each day. You do not dream in this state; you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.
Magical Resilience. You have +2 AC when targeted by a spell attack.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Undercommon. Your voice sounds artificial and resonant, as if it were composed of distinct tones.
Subrace. There are three subraces of crystalborn dependent on their starter stone.

Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 2.

Damage Resistance. You are resistant to slashing and fire damage.
